dict.string: NSBoilerplate CocoaPods template. Requires iOS5 and Includes: BlocksKit, SSToolkit, CocoaLumberjack, Reachability, SVProgressHUD, AFNetworking, IAPValidation, IAPManager

#Podfile generated by NSBoilerplate (http://nsboilerplate.com)
platform :ios, '5.0'
pod 'BlocksKit', '1.8.1' pod 'SSToolkit', '1.0.2' pod 'CocoaLumberjack', '1.6' pod 'Reachability', '3.1.0' pod 'SVProgressHUD', '0.9' pod 'AFNetworking', '1.1.0' pod 'IAPValidation', '0.0.1' pod 'IAPManager', '0.2.0'
